name: Another Lovely Day
description:
Only controls are the arrow keys.

Practicing with Parent Objects and more natural ways of moving the player between Rooms in GameMaker. And since I haven't released anything this year yet, I thought I'd release this! :)

I couldn't get some stuff to fully work. One of the doors just lets you pass through without unlocking it, even though it worked before, but that's game design magic for you.

Also when the game resets it becomes cursed. I still have no idea why, but it's kinda spooky and I like it that way.
